resources.string:
Features:

- Use the actionbar menu to choose between loading the places from the local database, or loading the places from a remote webservice (mongolab).

- Use the actionbar menu to select a city or to find your location.

- Works in offline with configuration: Select a city and Local database.

API and libraries:

- ContentProvider/CursorLoader/LoaderManager are used to load the places from the database.

- Volley and Gson libraries are used to query the remote web service.

- Universal Image Loader library is used to load the images of the places.

- Google Play Service is used to find the location of the user.

- Geocoder is used to get the real address from the location.

- Crouton library to display errors.
